verbs.description: romneyintwowords vs [V: obamaintwowords] the presidential campaign of 2012 played out on twitter today as supporters of president barack obama and former mass governor mitt romney waged an online battle of brevity via the hashtags romneyintwowords and obamaintwowords as best as we can tell the skirmish started this afternoon when obama supporters mocked romney via the hashtag romneyintwowords twitter mitt romney barack obama
